attributes.action: allows individuals to obtain free credit reports and make security breaches public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to combat the rise in identity fraud I feel we should take a similar approach to the American system. Individuals should be able to obtain free credit reports once a year, this will alert individuals if someone it trying to obtain credit in their name. Also companies should be required to make public the fact that they have had a security breach with potential loss of private information including but not limited to credit card details, name and addresses ect.
